title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
overview: In an effort to provide extensive coverage of worldwide financial markets, Bloomberg features several regional shows under the "Bloomberg Markets'' banner, with each focusing on that geographic area's markets. This American-focused version is hosted by Mark Barton, Scarlet Fu, David Gura and Vonnie Quinn. They report the latest business news and speak with the likes of political and business leaders to help investors make investment decisions that build their portfolios.
